variations.variation: The commercial invoice date should not exceed 90 days from the shipment date.
The shipment date's corresponding commercial invoice must be within 90 days.
The validity period of the commercial invoice cannot surpass 90 days after the goods are shipped.
The maximum validity duration for the commercial invoice is 90 days from the date of dispatch.
The commercial invoice's expiration must occur within a 90-day window after the shipment date.
The issue date of bill of lading should not exceed [insert timeframe] from the shipment date.
The bill of lading's issuance date must be within [insert timeframe] of the shipment date.
The validity period of the bill of lading cannot surpass [insert timeframe] after the goods are shipped.
The bill of lading's issue should be no later than [insert timeframe] from the shipment date.
The maximum validity duration for the bill of lading is [insert timeframe] from the date of dispatch.
